name: Optimus Pie
description:
Optimus Pie is a Rund & Gun Adventure game with more mobility. You play solo or  with a friend together as a cake shooting robot that has a laser grappling hook, a jetpack, a power shield and can eject ice cream bombs. Try to reach the end of each level with as many health and as less trys as possible. 

Here you can play a demo version with one bigger level until the official release. 

Controls for singleplayer mode:

  • A - move left
  • D - move right
  • W or Space - use jetpack
  • Q - use shield
  • E - eject ice cream bomb
  • Move mouse - move the cake canon
  • Mouse + left click - shoot cake in mouse direction
  • Mouse + right click - activate a laser grappling hook

Controls for 2 players:

Player 1:

  • Arrow left - move left
  • Arrow right - move right
  • Arrow up - use jetpack
  • Q - use shield
  • E - eject ice cream bomb

Player 2:

  • Move mouse - move the cake canon
  • Mouse + left click - shoot cake in mouse direction
  • Mouse + right click - activate a laser grappling hook
